overview: Steve Sterling, a former Mr. Teenage America, takes on Canada's best muscle talent in four truly unforgettable body beautiful wrestling matches. Steve trained hard and long to become a focused, muscle-bound mat machine that systematically destroys his opponents. In the pro ring, he lays waste to the young, eager Keith Powers and then the strong, determined Johnny Bravo. In the oil pit, he squashed kickboxing pro Paul Perris and treacherous wrestler, Dirk Shannon. But the Canadian Bodypack get in their hits, kicks, and licks too. Steve suffers mercilessly at the hands of Canada's finest. But the harder they beat him, the harder he beats them back in his custom red, white, and blue second-skin bikinis. If rock hard, sweat-wet, bone-crushing, muscle wrenching, erotic pro wrestling action is your choice, Steve Sterling delivers!
title: Steve Sterling Conquers Canada
